login.title: Login
login.signInMessage: Sign in to start your session
login.logoutSuccess: You have been logged out successfully.

stock.title: Stock
stock.name: Name
stock.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
stock.addFailCodeExists: Add failed: item code already exists.
stock.addFailNameExists: Add failed: item name already exists.
stock.editFailCodeExists: Edit failed: item code already exists.
stock.editFailNameExists: Edit failed: item name already exists.

users.title: Manage Users
users.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete user {{email}}?
users.confirmResetPassword: Are you sure you want to reset password for {{email}}?
users.passwordInfo: Default password for new users and reset password is "password"

stockIn.title: Stock In
stockIn.name: Name
stockIn.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete stock in {{name}} on {{date}}?
stockIn.editFailNegativeStock: Edit failed: reducing this quantity would make stock negative.
stockIn.deleteFailNegativeStock: Delete failed: removing this entry would make stock negative.

stockOut.title: Stock Out
stockOut.name: Name
stockOut.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete stock out {{name}} on {{date}}?
stockOut.editFailNegativeStock: Edit failed: increasing this quantity would make stock negative.

log.title: App Log
log.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to delete all saved log data?

account.title: Edit Account
account.changeEmailSameEmail: New email must be different from current email.
account.changePasswordSameAsOld: New password must be different from old password.
account.changePasswordMismatch: New password and confirmation do not match.
account.changeEmailSuccess: Email changed successfully. Please sign in again.
account.changePasswordSuccess: Password changed successfully. Please sign in again.
account.changeRoleSuccess: Role changed successfully. Please sign in again.
